title: NEFF Christmas Snowboard Special
description: Neff Snowboarding team rider Nick Pooch recently hit the slopes dressed as Santa Claus to spread a little Neff Christmas cheer on the slopes at Sierra At Tahoe. Check him out as he rips the mountain and passes out Neff Headwear beanies along the way. Thanks to @wojt3k #growupproductions for making it happen!
